landing.title: Transform Your Nutrition with AI
landing.subtitle: Stop guessing. Start tracking. NutriTrackAI analyzes your meals to give you personalized insights and help you reach your health goals faster.
landing.feature1-desc: Simply describe your meals and our AI will instantly calculate calories, macros, and provide actionable insights.
landing.feature2-desc: No more manual entry. Our conversational interface makes logging your food as simple as sending a text message.
landing.feature3-desc: Whether you want to lose weight, gain muscle, or maintain, get a clear view of your progress and stay motivated.
landing.visualize-desc: Go beyond numbers. Our beautiful, interactive charts and calendar give you a clear and intuitive understanding of your habits and trends over time.

onboarding.subtitle: Let's set up your profile to personalize your experience.
onboarding.supplements-label: Do you take any of these supplements?
onboarding.summary-subtitle: Based on your info, here are your initial targets.

auth.login-desc: Sign in to access your dashboard.
auth.signup-desc: Fill out the form below to get started.
auth.terms: By clicking continue, you agree to our <terms>Terms of Service</terms> and <privacy>Privacy Policy</privacy>.
auth.toast-google-welcome: Welcome! Let's get your profile set up.
auth.error-invalid-creds: No account found with this email or password. Please try again.
auth.error-email-in-use: This email is already associated with an account. Please sign in instead.
auth.error-invalid-email: The email address you entered is not valid.
auth.error-weak-pass: Your password is too weak. Please choose a stronger password.
auth.error-unexpected: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.
auth.error-google-failed: Could not sign in with Google at this time. Please try again or use email/password.

dashboard.welcome-subtitle: You're on track for your goal of {goal}. Let's review your progress.
dashboard.chart-desc: Calories consumed over the last 7 days.
dashboard.modal-no-data: No data logged for this day. Use the chat to add your meals!
dashboard.toast-analysis-failed-desc: I couldn't understand that. Please try rephrasing your meal description.
dashboard.chat-error: Sorry, I couldn't analyze that. The format might be incorrect or missing details. Please try again.

profile.summary-desc: A quick look at your progress and habits.
profile.info-desc: The personal details used for calculations.
profile.goals-desc: Your recommended daily intake targets vs. your actual average.
profile.toast-avatar-updated-desc: Your new photo has been saved successfully.
profile.toast-avatar-failed-desc: There was an error reading the file.

day-modal.title: Details for {date}
day-modal.meals-no-data: No meals logged for this day.

chat.initial-message: Hi! Tell me what you ate today, including any supplements. I'll analyze it for you.
chat.title: Nutritional Chat
chat.copy-failed-desc: Could not copy text to clipboard.
chat.log-today-error-desc: You can only submit one nutritional analysis per day. You can see today's entry on the calendar.
chat.missing-labels-error-desc: Please label at least two meals (e.g., "Breakfast" and "Lunch") to get an accurate analysis.
chat.server-error: An unexpected server error occurred. Please try again later.
chat.server-error-toast-desc: There was an error processing your request on the server.
chat.already-logged: You've already logged your meals for today.
chat.keyword-helper: Please include at least two labels for an accurate analysis:

achievements.unlocked-bronze: {unlockedCount} / {totalCount} Unlocked. Basic milestones to get you started.
achievements.first-log-desc: Log your first day of meals.
achievements.ai-power-desc: Use the AI chat to log your meals.
achievements.weekend-warrior-desc: Log your meals on a weekend day.
achievements.budding-chef-desc: Hit all your macro targets perfectly for the first time.
achievements.perfect-week-desc: Achieve a perfect 7/7 "on-target" days in a single week.
achievements.macro-specialist-desc: Hit all your macro targets perfectly on 5 different days.
achievements.30-day-club-desc: Log an entire month of meals.
achievements.macro-virtuoso-desc: Hit all your macro targets perfectly on 15 different days.
achievements.seasoned-pro-desc: Log a total of 50 days of meals.
achievements.goal-reached-desc: You did it! You have successfully reached your weight goal.
achievements.century-club-desc: Log 100 days. Your commitment is extraordinary!

walkthrough.step1-desc: Let's take a quick tour to get you started on your nutritional journey.
walkthrough.step2-desc: This is your mission control. Every day you log your meals, the calendar will light up with a color showing how close you were to your goals. Green is on-target, yellow is close, and red is a bit off.
walkthrough.step3-desc: This is where the magic happens. Instead of manually entering every item, just tell the AI what you ate throughout the day. You can only successfully log your meals once per day, so give it a full summary!
walkthrough.step3-highlight: IMPORTANT: The idea is to do this once at the end of the day.
walkthrough.step4-desc: Click your avatar in the top right to visit your profile. You can see all your stats, goals, and even change your profile picture. That's it! You're all set to start tracking.
